meanings.definition: Plural noun: Coins worth half a penny.
meanings.sent1: I found a jar full of shiny halfpennies.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper gave me a handful of halfpennies in change.
meanings.sent3: The children used halfpennies to play a game of pretend shop.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like halfpennies in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The sound of halfpennies clinking together was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: Verb: To collect or count halfpennies.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys halfpennies collecting as a hobby.
meanings.sent2: Every evening, he halfpennies the coins from his pocket.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel halfpennies its acorns for the winter.
meanings.sent4: He halfpennies memories of his childhood like precious treasures.
meanings.sent5: The librarian halfpennies the books on the shelf with care.
